kernfrasen: The wisdom of the world can take you far, but it can’t take you home.
returned to their country by another route
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: FAITH IS A JOURNEY TOWARD HOME

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The wisdom of the world can take you far, but it can’t take you home.

cognitieve_implicaties: Human reason is a vehicle that eventually runs out of fuel.
theologische_implicaties: General revelation is real but insufficient for salvation.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Implies that 'home' is a place of rest rather than a place of service.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the 'home' schema to describe the intimacy of knowing God versus mere facts.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Journey' metaphor as a backbone, linking the physical travel of the Magi to the intellectual travel of modern elites.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher tries to balance 'legalism' and 'relativism' as two directions, which slightly conflicts with the 'path' metaphor used earlier.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: If faith is a path, you are on it or off it; if it is 'nuance', it is a spectrum.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Uses 'bursting banks' to describe the Holy Spirit's intervention in human logic.

sterktes.beschrijving: De-mythologizes the 'Three Kings' to re-establish the Magi as 'Intelligentsia'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: These are the learned, the professors at Harvard, Yale, Princeton.

risicos.beschrijving: The focus on 'dated' elite opinion might lead to a rejection of all contemporary scholarship.
risicos.voorbeeld: Our grandchildren will laugh at that.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The journey of the Magi from the East to a house in Bethlehem.
sub_worlds: The New York Times op-ed page

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; bridges the gap between 'Magi' and 'Wise Men'.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By showing God's wisdom as 'eternal' versus the world's 'dated' wisdom.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Textual correction (no kings, no three, no stable).
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: The Magi as elite pagan seekers.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits Epiphany themes of revelation to the nations.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'Wisdom is a Path' and 'Wisdom is a Building' (dated/eternal) metaphors. It successfully moves from an intellectual source domain to a relational target domain.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Use more embodied language regarding the 'weight' of the cross to contrast with the 'lightness' of superficial wisdom.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The heavy wood of the cross anchors the drifting opinions of the age.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Frame 'nuance' as the ability to see the whole landscape from the destination of the journey.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests that nothing new can be true.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify the role of 'Common Grace' to validate ongoing human discovery.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To connect with the 'Shepherd' quote in the text.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge the ancient text with the modern hearer's mental world.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive function of 'Magi as Professors' rather than just the beauty of the star.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Prioritizes the conceptual mapping over the four-stage learning cycle.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses the 'Container' schema (bursting banks) to explain the Holy Spirit's work.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: On their way out the door
appendices.notities: Preacher relies heavily on C.S. Lewis's 'Chronological Snobbery' as a conceptual foundation.
